ygData.subject: RE: RE: level 8 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone else had this song (Lament) behave weirdly on them?  There have been a handful of occasions where I get the message ( XXXX looks sad ), attempt to
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone else had this song (Lament) behave weirdly on them? There have
been a handful of occasions where I get the message ("XXXX looks sad"),
attempt to pull another nearby MOB, and then both of them come running (even
the lamented one). Just recently, I was trying to pull some elites out of
the king room. I lulled the patriarch (got the "sad" message) and then
everything started coming at me (including the patriarch). Like I said,
this has only happened maybe 2 or 3 times in my whole career. A druid
friend of mine also stated that she occasionally has the same thing happen
with Harmony. It's somewhat similar to how Pixie Strike or Apalling Screech
apparently do nothing, even though you get the message.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 31 Bard [Povar]

[snip]

> From: Ryan Barker <rbarker@...>
>
> I used this song to great effect while in permafrost way back
> when I was
> level 16 (oh so long ago). It was great. Resist rates were
> rather low
> and I could usually pull 1 or 2 at a time which is good for
> perma.. I then
> began adventuring in outdoor zones where harmony is much more
> effective due
> to it being aoe and not agroing monsters if it fails.

[snip]
